Even almost 10 years laters this is still god tier.

There are fairly few video games out there that reach the heights that Portal 2 achieves. It is a masterpiece from beginning to end. Never did I find myself bored or annoyed by the story, the gameplay, the graphics, (etc.). The addition of a two person multiplayer is great once you finish the single player campaign.
Das spiel ist sehr interessant und von der Story und Grafik besser als der erste.

Simply Amazing

I was worried that I won't like the game because I'm not that into puzzle games, but I finished Portal 1 in around 2 hours or so, and I instantly went to Portal 2, just to be blown away.

I loved the story, the puzzles, the characters, so much of this game is amazing. I don't know what more to say, I was going to make a essay like review, but there isn't many words I can use to explain this game, this is amazing, play it.

Thank You!
Az egyik kedvenc játékom valaha, de még csak most kezdek függőjévé válni rendesen...jobb később, mint soha.

Great Game but I have one major issue: When playing coop I was constantly harassed by a player named "Gamilkanan" who was my "teammate" for the entirety of the coop experience. He threw valuable items into the abyss while constantly placing portals in places that would kill you if you walked through them. He also continuesly spammed the "emote" button when standing next to me, which forces both players into a short animation where the two robots do a fist bumb or some other shit. If you encounter this entity, leave the game immediately. I hope valve bans this awful person from steam, otherwise my lawyers will hear about this....
Very fun puzzle game! I'd recommend it for those who like puzzles!

Gra z potencjałem, niestety dość ciekawe zagadki są zagłuszane nudnymi i nagranymi złej jakości mikrofonem dialogami. Po 30 minutach rozgrywki zdecydowałem się na całkowite wyciszenie dialogów i wyłączenie napisów, od tamtego momentu grało mi się zdecydowanie przyjemniej. Niestety same zagadki szybko zaczynają się powtarzać, ponadto widać że większość z nich jest podpatrzona z innych gier np. zagadka nr 3 jest ukradziona prosto z gry fallout 4. Po ok. 2 godzinach rozgrywki (bez tych irytujących dialogów) gra mi się znudziła. Nie polecam nikomu, jeśli chcecie rozwiązywać CIEKAWE zagadki w grach to polecam zagrać w hide and seek w CS:GO.
Bardzo polecam kupić jak nie wiecie jaką gre

[h1]Portal 2: analise[/h1]
- Um jogo que envolve a resolução de vários Puzzles difíceis e fáceis com as mecânicas do jogo como a possibilidade de fazer portais com a sua portal gun , alem de tudo isso no modo singleplayer  há uma historia muito interessante e personagens muito engraçados e divertidos. Também há um modo multiplayer que você e seu amigo podem jogar e resolver puzzles juntos, alem de se divertir muito jogando. Quem jogou o primeiro jogo deveria jogar o segundo da franquia e quem não jogou nenhum tem que jogar os dois, vale cada minuto.

Nota: 9/10

Очееееень классная игра! Если вам говорят, что от компьютерных игр тупеют, то покажите этому идиоту Portal 2. Я в школе так не развивал свой мозг, как в этой а*енной игрушке. Сюжет, музыка, головоломки.. всё изумительно! Прошёл с наслаждением и вам советую!
Мне кажется, что более лучший головоломки, чем портал не будет (ну кроме portal 3)

Portal 2 is a MASTERPIECE. Everyone should have this game, as well as the first game. There are some bugs but they are mostly not visible in a normal playthrough, only for speedrunners that use them. The voice actors are perfectly chosen for their roles. The graphics of the Source engine look beautiful. Rating "nine nine nine nine nine nine ni-/10." DEFINATLY buy this game in sale.
Easily my favourite game of all time.

Portal 2 is very good. It's more refined and thought out compared to Portal 1, where the first game is more simple. The only thing that pisses me off is the constant loading screens in between levels.
